00073 #include <dev/irqreg.h>
00074 
00079 
00080 static int AvrSpiIrqCtl(int cmd, void *param);
00081 
00082 IRQ_HANDLER sig_SPI = {
00083 #ifdef NUT_PERFMON
00084     0,                          /* Interrupt counter, ir_count. */
00085 #endif
00086     NULL,                       /* Passed argument, ir_arg. */
00087     NULL,                       /* Handler subroutine, ir_handler. */
00088     AvrSpiIrqCtl                /* Interrupt control, ir_ctl. */
00089 };
00090 
00106 static int AvrSpiIrqCtl(int cmd, void *param)
00107 {
00108     int rc = 0;
00109     unsigned int *ival = (unsigned int *) param;
00110     int_fast8_t enabled = bit_is_set(SPCR, SPIE);
00111     uint8_t bval;
00112 
00113     /* Disable interrupt. */
00114     cbi(SPCR, SPIE);
00115 
00116     switch (cmd) {
00117     case NUT_IRQCTL_INIT:
00118         enabled = 0;
00119     case NUT_IRQCTL_CLEAR:
00120         /* Clear any pending interrupt. */
00121         if (bit_is_set(SPSR, SPIF)) {
00122             bval = inb(SPDR);
00123         }
00124         break;
00125     case NUT_IRQCTL_STATUS:
00126         if (bit_is_set(SPSR, SPIF)) {
00127             *ival = 1;
00128         } else {
00129             *ival = 0;
00130         }
00131         if (enabled) {
00132             *ival |= 0x80;
00133         }
00134         break;
00135     case NUT_IRQCTL_ENABLE:
00136         enabled = 1;
00137         break;
00138     case NUT_IRQCTL_DISABLE:
00139         enabled = 0;
00140         break;
00141     case NUT_IRQCTL_GETPRIO:
00142         *ival = 16;
00143         break;
00144 #ifdef NUT_PERFMON
00145     case NUT_IRQCTL_GETCOUNT:
00146         *ival = (unsigned int) sig_SPI.ir_count;
00147         sig_SPI.ir_count = 0;
00148         break;
00149 #endif
00150     default:
00151         rc = -1;
00152         break;
00153     }
00154 
00155     /* Enable interrupt. */
00156     if (enabled) {
00157         sbi(SPCR, SPIE);
00158     }
00159     return rc;
00160 }
00161 
00165 #ifdef __IMAGECRAFT__
00166 #pragma interrupt_handler SIG_SPI:iv_SPI_STC
00167 #endif
00168 NUTSIGNAL(SIG_SPI, sig_SPI)
